channel.title: [525] making shops
channel.description: I added shops in shops.java and then i added shop cases in shophandler.java and finally added that thing in NPCoption2.java, still when i click option 2 on the case (npc_id): it doesnt work :S Help please. Im new to 525, any tut on adding shops please refer me a link to it... I'll rep++ if you helped me.

item.title: [525] making shops
item.dc:creator: @Sagi Sagi
item.description:
@Sagi wrote:

I added shops in shops.java and then i added shop cases in shophandler.java and finally added that thing in NPCoption2.java, still when i click option 2 on the case (npc_id): it doesnt work :S Help please. Im new to 525, any tut on adding shops please refer me a link to it…
I’ll rep++ if you helped me.
